const response = await client.search({
  index: "sales",
  filter_path: "aggregations",
  size: 0,
  aggs: {
    buckets: {
      composite: {
        sources: [
          {
            month: {
              date_histogram: {
                field: "date",
                calendar_interval: "month",
              },
            },
          },
          {
            type: {
              terms: {
                field: "type",
              },
            },
          },
        ],
      },
      aggs: {
        avg_price: {
          rate: {
            field: "price",
            unit: "day",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
